title: TYPE FROM OLD BEER LABEL
content:
Hi,

I was wondering if anyone can identify the typeface(s) or know similar ones for the text "Brading's" and "Brand Lager," and "The Famous Cinci"?

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823215651im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Cincinnati-Cream-Brand-Lager-Beer-Labels-Brading-Breweries-Limited_19874-1_4433.jpg)
author: bfingeroth

comments.content:
"Brand Lager" and "The Famous Cinci": I don't have an exact match but you may be able to approximate it using **[Blue Highway](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823215651/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Typodermic&ffam=Blue%20Highway%20-%20Regular&fstyle=i&fsize=60&fid=3b7e7e678645357a77e3fe6c440e44ab&wrap=2&text=THE%20FAMOUS%20CINCI%20BRAND%20LAGER)** by Ray Larabie (Typodermic) by modifying /H & /M and probably some more letters

"BRANDIN"S": The closer I can see are some condensed forms of **[DIN 1451](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823215651/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe&ffam=DIN%201451%20Std%20-%20Engschrift&fid=1cf07fdc01da97ba3a1410d18951d28f&fsize=60&text=BRADING'S&fit=1)**

"BRADING'S" - only similars: [Inventory](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823215651/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/inventory/), [Canby](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823215651/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/canby/)  
"Cincinnati Cream": those I like (and even you're not after it ;) [Fan Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823215651/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/fan-script/), [Chicago Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823215651/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/chicagoscript.php), [Ballpark Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823215651/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/ballparkscript.php), [Ephemera](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823215651/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/ephemera.php), [Casey](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823215651/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/casey/)  
""Brand Lager"/"The Famous Cinci": suggestion by Fivos is fine to me. Some more: [Outer Loop](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823215651/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/outer-loop-nf/), [Benton Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823215651/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/benton-sans/), [Interstate](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823215651/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/interstate/), [Highway Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823215651/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/pixymbols/highway-gothic/), [Saa](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823215651/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/saa/), [Signal](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823215651/http:/www.youworkforthem.com/font/T1052/signal)
